[60+ FPS v1.0]
20676170 00000000

[60 FPS v1.0]
20676170 00000001

[30 FPS v1.0]
20676170 00000002

[15 FPS v1.0]
20676170 00000003

[Enable 3D Slider]
2067616C 00000002
{Use 3D Slider to disable AA}

[Enable 3D Slider (Button Switch Mode)]
DD000000 00000200
2067616C 00000000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000100
2067616C 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Press L to Disable / Press R to Enable.}

[Fix Screen Moves When 3D is ON]
00673DE8 00000000
00673DF0 00000000
{Because on 3DS, the Screen will slide to the Left.}

[Loop Character's Animation (Hold R)]
DD000000 00000100
00676270 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{While using it, the Scene will not change. And may freeze Character when Animation is over.}
